title: Hour 2 - Rod Walker and Rex Chapman (06-04-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Rod Walker and Rex Chapman (06-04-20)
description:
Rod Walker says Drew Brees has to be tone deaf to give his opinion of the flag during this time. Rex Chapman says he stole for his pill habit and nobody ever called him a thug.
